rows.Parties Involved:
Sentinel, an imprint of Penguin Publishing Group, a division of Penguin Random House LLC (Sentinel)
								New York, New York
rows.Status and Terms: A contract in which the undersigned agreed to complete a manuscript in exchange for publication and $325,000 in compensation, payable in installments, by Sentinel. The contract also provides for royalty payments in the following manner: 15% of the retail price for all hardcover editions of the book sold; 7.5% to 10% of the retail price for all trade edition and mass market paperback copies sold; and 25% of the receipts for e-book edition sales.
